mapper.select: select House_id, User_id, Admin_id, House_title, House_rent, House_pledge, House_months, House_address, House_shape, House_direction, House_area, House_floor, House_detail, House_jwd, House_isRented, House_coverPic, House_picList, created_time, updated_time, status from cjhouse.house_rent where House_id = #{houseId} and House_isRented='N'

select House_id, User_id, Admin_id, House_title, House_rent, House_pledge, House_months, House_address, House_shape, House_direction, House_area, House_floor, House_detail, House_jwd, House_isRented, House_coverPic, House_picList, created_time, updated_time, status from cjhouse.house_rent where House_id = #{houseId} and House_isRented <> 'Y'

select House_id, User_id, Admin_id, House_title, House_rent, House_pledge, House_months, House_address, House_shape, House_direction, House_area, House_floor, House_detail, House_jwd, House_isRented, House_coverPic, House_picList, created_time, updated_time, status from cjhouse.house_rent where House_id = #{houseId} and House_isRented = 'Y'

select House_id, User_id, Admin_id, House_title, House_rent, House_pledge, House_months, House_address, House_shape, House_direction, House_area, House_floor, House_detail, House_jwd, House_isRented, House_coverPic, House_picList, created_time, updated_time, status from cjhouse.house_rent where House_isRented = 'N' limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select House_id, User_id, Admin_id, House_title, House_rent, House_pledge, House_months, House_address, House_shape, House_direction, House_area, House_floor, House_detail, House_jwd, House_isRented, House_coverPic, House_picList, created_time, updated_time, status from cjhouse.house_rent limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select House_id, User_id, Admin_id, House_title, House_rent, House_pledge, House_months, House_address, House_shape, House_direction, House_area, House_floor, House_detail, House_jwd, House_isRented, House_coverPic, House_picList, created_time, updated_time, status from cjhouse.house_rent where House_rent BETWEEN #{rent1} AND #{rent2} AND house_months BETWEEN #{month1} AND #{month2} AND House_isRented = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into cjhouse.house_rent(User_id, Admin_id, House_title, House_rent, House_pledge, House_months, House_address, House_shape, House_direction, House_area, House_floor, House_detail, House_jwd, House_isRented, House_coverPic, House_picList, created_time, updated_time, status) values (#{userId}, #{adminId}, #{houseTitle}, #{houseRent}, #{housePledge}, #{houseMonths}, #{houseAddress}, #{houseShape}, #{houseDirection}, #{houseArea}, #{houseFloor}, #{houseDetail}, #{houseJwd}, #{houseIsrented}, #{houseCoverpic}, #{housePiclist}, NOW(), #{updatedTime}, 0)
mapper.update:
update cjhouse.house_rent
User_id = #{userId},
Admin_id = #{adminId},
House_title = #{houseTitle},
House_rent = #{houseRent},
House_pledge = #{housePledge},
House_months = #{houseMonths},
House_address = #{houseAddress},
House_shape = #{houseShape},
House_direction = #{houseDirection},
House_area = #{houseArea},
House_floor = #{houseFloor},
House_detail = #{houseDetail},
House_jwd = #{houseJwd},
House_isRented = #{houseIsrented},
House_coverPic = #{houseCoverpic},
House_picList = #{housePiclist},
created_time = #{createdTime},
updated_time = #{updatedTime},
status = #{status},
where House_id = #{houseId}
